ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( IsChanged(Select__c), Select__c, OR( ISBLANK(Number_of_Payments__c), Number_of_Payments__c <= 0 ), OR( ISBLANK(Offer_Amount__c), Offer_Amount__c <= 0 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To select an approved offer, it must have an offer amount and number of payments.
